GPS detail? Delete Detail Delete this activity Delete only GPS trace Press Yes to delete all selected activities or press No to cancel the delete. Delete Press Yes to delete all record of this activity or press No to cancel. Press Yes to delete ONLY the GPS log detail for this activity (the summary will be kept) or press No to cancel.
